description: Adds animate and replace to page nav params.
replace:
<xf:form action="{{ link('banning/emails/delete') }}" 
		 id="banned-emails"
		 ajax="true"
		 class="block"
		 data-xf-init="ajax-page"
		 data-page="{$page}"
		 data-filter="#banned-emails"
		 data-replace="#banned-emails .block-container, #banned-emails .block-outer with .block-container, .block-outer">
